member.name: T:Lesnikowski.Windows.MhtDataProvider
member.summary: Represents HTML/plain text mht data provider for the WebBrowserControl.

member.name: T:Lesnikowski.Windows.IHtmlDataProvider
member.summary: Represents HTML data provider for the WebBrowserControl.

member.summary: Gets the protocol list handled by this provider.

member.param: Mht document to extract data from.

member.name: M:Lesnikowski.Windows.MhtDataProvider.GetProtocols
member.summary: Gets the protocol list handled by this provider. "Http:" protocol is handled by this provider.

member.name: M:Lesnikowski.Windows.MhtDataProvider.GetHtml
member.summary: Gets the HTML or plain text data.

member.name: M:Lesnikowski.Windows.MhtDataProvider.GetData(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data using ContentLocationof the elements.

member.name: T:Lesnikowski.Windows.MailBrowserControl
member.summary: Enables users show e-mail content inside a form.

member.summary: Loads the HTML provider into the .
member.returns: Returns true on success, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Lesnikowski.Windows.MailHtmlDataProvider
member.summary: Represents HTML/plain text email data provider for the WebBrowserControl.

member.name: M:Lesnikowski.Windows.MailHtmlDataProvider.GetProtocols
member.summary: Gets the protocol list handled by this provider. Only "Cid:" protocol is handled by this provider.

member.name: M:Lesnikowski.Windows.MailHtmlDataProvider.GetHtml
member.summary: Gets the HTML or plain text data.
